entry.source: {F812}Far-gazing woman\0{F87A,62}{F813,1,403302}Hey, whatever happened to that cocoon{F801}in Shinjuku National Park?{F801}{F802}It flew off right before the ceiling{F801}appeared... Maybe it's still up there.{F801}{F802}I wonder what happened to the ones{F801}"chosen by God" who were inside?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Far-gazing woman\0{F87A,62}{F813,1,403312}On that day... I wish I'd stayed with{F801}the cocoon in the park... I should have{F801}found a way to stay with them...{F801}{F802}Who cares if I wasn't chosen by God!?{F801}I just don't want demons to eat me!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Far-gazing woman\0{F87A,62}{F813,1,403303}When the cocoon took off from the park,{F801}I felt like I'd flunked out of school{F801}or something...{F801}{F802}But I don't care anymore. I can feel{F801}the hope building inside Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Far-gazing woman\0{F87A,62}{F813,1,403303}When the cocoon took off from the park,{F801}I felt like I'd flunked out of school{F801}or something...{F801}{F802}But I don't care anymore. I can feel{F801}the hope building inside Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Far-gazing woman\0{F87A,62}{F813,1,403312}People are coming down now from up{F801}above the ceiling... The Eastern{F801}Kingdom of Mikado, right?{F801}{F802}Are they the same ones who were in the{F801}cocoon in Shinjuku National Park? Then...{F801}is my boy one of them...?{F801}{F802}I-I should give it up already... By now,{F801}he'll have his own life. I shouldn't{F801}interfere...{F801}

Nasty stuff.{F801}

C-Can you listen to{F801}this problem I got?{F801}{F802}I hear peace is coming back to Tokyo...{F801}Do you really mean it!?{F801}{F802}My whole life is one worry after the{F801}next. But hey,{F801}you won't hear me complaining.{F801}{F802}Everyone knows we're still alive today{F801}thanks to their stockpiles of stuff.{F801}{F802}Plus, the electricity they generate{F801}let us live in safety in these{F801}underground districts...{F801}
